description: Schema for storing criteria evaluation data for Variant Curation
title: Evaluation

___criteria.description: ACMG criteria to be evaluated. Must be one of the 28 codes
___criteria.title: Criteria

___population.description: Population data used as evidence to evaluate the criteria.
___population.title: Population

___segregation.description: Segregation data used as evidence to evaluate the criteria.
___segregation.comment: will link to object segregation later.
___segregation.title: Segregation

___explanation.description: The reason to select evaluation value.
___explanation.title: Explanation

___computational.description: Computational data used as evidnece to evaluate the criteria.
___computational.title: Computational

___affiliation.description: The affiliation this classification is associated with.
___affiliation.title: Affiliation

___functional.description: Functional data used as evidence to evaluate the criteria.
___functional.title: Functional
